Package eus.klimu.notification.api

Class NotificationController

java.lang.Object
eus.klimu.notification.api.NotificationController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/notification")
public class NotificationController
extends java.lang.Object
Create, update, delete and get information for the Notifications. They represent the different notifications generated by the KLIMU alert system. Takes care of all the CRUD methods, working with the database through an internal Service.

  • Field Summary

    A class that allows modifying the locations.

    A class that allows modifying the notification types.

  • Method Details

    • getNotification

      @GetMapping(value="/{id}", produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Notification> getNotification​(@PathVariable long id)

      Get a notification based on its ID.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/notification/{id}

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the notification to look for.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the notification was found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getNotifications

      @GetMapping(value="/location", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Notification>> getNotifications​(@RequestBody LocationDTO location)

      Get a list of notifications based on a location.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/notification/location

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the notification to look for.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the notifications were found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getNotifications

      @GetMapping(value="/type", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Notification>> getNotifications​(@RequestBody NotificationTypeDTO notificationType)

      Get a list of notifications based on its type.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/notification/type

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml

      A 200 ok if the notifications were found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getNotifications

      @GetMapping(value="/date/location", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Notification>> getNotifications​(@RequestBody LocationDTO location, @RequestBody java.util.Date startDate, @RequestBody java.util.Date endDate)

      Get a list of notifications for a specific date and a location.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/notification/date/location

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      location - The location the notifications must be from.
      startDate - The date the notifications must be higher from.
      endDate - The date the notification must be lower from.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the notifications were found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getNotifications

      @GetMapping(value="/date/type", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Notification>> getNotifications​(@RequestBody NotificationTypeDTO notificationType, @RequestBody java.util.Date startDate, @RequestBody java.util.Date endDate)

      Get a list of notifications for a specific date and type.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/notification/date/type

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      notificationType - The type the notifications must be from.
      startDate - The date the notifications must be higher from.
      endDate - The date the notification must be lower from.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the notifications were found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • createNotification

      @PostMapping(value="/create", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Notification> createNotification​(@RequestBody NotificationDTO notification)

      Save a new Notification on the database.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/notification/create

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      notification - The notification that is going to be stored.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the notification was created or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • createAllNotifications

      @PostMapping(value="/create/all", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Notification>> createAllNotifications​(@RequestBody java.util.List<NotificationDTO> notifications)

      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.

    • updateNotification

    • deleteNotification

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/notification/delete/{id}

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the notification that is going to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the notification was deleted or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • deleteNotification
